title: Print, "Paper Doll Costume in Yellow with White Lace and Pink Rose Garlands", 1876–80
medium: Lithograph, brush and watercolor on cream heavy wove paper
description: Yellow dress with white lace top layer.  Pink rose garlands cascade down either side of her gown.  Both back and front of dress represented for this paper doll outfit.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Paper Doll Costume in Yellow with White Lace and Pink Rose Garlands", 1876–80.
1876–80. Lithograph, brush and watercolor on cream heavy wove paper. Gift of Grace Lincoln Temple. 1937-22-19.
